rules_text:
Vanishing 4 [i](This permanent enters with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
Whenever you remove a time counter from this enchantment, you may return a creature card with mana value equal to or less than the number of time counters on this enchantment from your graveyard to the battlefield.
